The Maven Unit and Integration Test Guide (MaUI Test Guide)

This will be the place to find information about how to do unit and integration tests in Maven projects.

This is no plugin etc. it's only a guide how to do different things with Maven.

Prerequisites

This guides requires that you already know Maven and it's life-cycles etc. It will not be explained how to configurate a Maven Plugin etc.

If you don't know Maven or it's basic usage i recommend you to read Maven: The Complete Reference or Maven by Example or other sources.

Overview

This guide is separated into three chapters where the first is about Unit Testing with Maven, the second about Integration Testing with Maven and the last one is Maven Plugin Integration Testing.
